ygData.subject: Re: Patch Message
ygData.msgSnippet: Sorry Sylly, my question was mainly for the group.  I was agreeing with you.  Every dragon/resist necessary encounter that I ve been to, I have never been
ygData.messageBody:
Sorry Sylly, my question was mainly for the group. I was agreeing
with you. Every dragon/resist necessary encounter that I've been to,
I have never been feared, resist gravity fluxed, taken minimal
damage, etc. I was just wondering why people are talking about this
soft resist cap. This is the first place that I've heard of it. And
I was joking about the bard conspiracy.

~Beatdrop Battledrum


--- In eqbards@y..., James Schuldes <jgs@s...> wrote:
> I don't understand your question (soft cap? uber-guild conspiracy?)
but I
> have been on raids, very recently, and have seen first hand where
the bard
> resist songs makes a significant difference. And this is not a one
time
> observation.
>
> Sylly
>
> -----Original Message-----
> From: beatdropbattledrum@h...
> [mailto:beatdropbattledrum@h...]
> Sent: Wednesday, February 21, 2001 5:33 PM
> To: eqbards@y...
> Subject: [eqbards] Re: Patch Message
>
>
> Has this soft cap on resists been confirmed? Or are we just
relying
> on this uberguild leader that may have a conspiracy against bards?
> LOL!
>
> ~Beatdrop Battledrum
>
>
> --- In eqbards@y..., James Schuldes <jgs@s...> wrote:
> > Not true in my experience. Bard songs that buff resists do still
> make a
> > difference.
> >
> > Sylly
